topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 1.1: Managing Metadata

body.p: Compute uses a metadata service for virtual machine instances to retrieve instance-specific data.
You can add and remove metadata the following components:

li.p: Launch the HP Helion OpenStack Horizon Dashboard.
Click the Admin dashboard, then the System panel, then the component link.
The flavors in the domain are listed.
For the flavor you want to modify, click the arrow icon in the Actions menu and select Update Metadata.
In the Update Metadata screen, click the + icon for a metadata term in the Available Metadata column to move the term to the Existing Metadata column.
Optionally, enter a new term in the Other field and click the + icon.
Metadata terms in the Available Metadata column are from the Glance Metadata Catalog.
Metadata terms in the Existing Metadata column are associated with the current flavor.
